meanings.definition: An outline of something, especially a person's face, seen from one side.
meanings.sent1: I drew a profile of my friend's face in art class.
meanings.sent2: The detective studied the suspect's profile to identify him.
meanings.sent3: The artist accidentally smudged the profile, making the nose look funny.
meanings.sent4: Her profile in the photograph captured her elegance and grace.
meanings.sent5: The profile of the mountain against the sunset was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A short article giving a description of a person or organization.
meanings.sent1: The magazine published a profile of the famous actress.
meanings.sent2: I read a profile of the company before the job interview.
meanings.sent3: The profile of the CEO included his love for skydiving.
meanings.sent4: Her profile in the newspaper highlighted her charity work.
meanings.sent5: The online profile of the organization detailed its mission and goals.

meanings.definition: A set of characteristics or qualities that identifies a type or category.
meanings.sent1: The teacher discussed the profiles of different animal species.
meanings.sent2: His personality profile indicated strong leadership skills.
meanings.sent3: The profile of a superhero includes bravery and superpowers.
meanings.sent4: The company's brand profile focuses on innovation and quality.
meanings.sent5: The profile of a successful student includes hard work and dedication.
